newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Monsanto upped on price.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Monsanto upped on price.

text.p: -- CS First Boston analyst Jay Hickman said he raised his rating on Monsanto Co to buy from hold due to the stock's "relative underperformance."

-- also cited "continued strength" of the company's strategy, "the promise of upside in the wake of the chemical business spinoff, and confidence in (chairman) Robert Shapiro's ability to renew shareholder confidence when he speaks in New York and Boston next week."
